results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Metal Sign - Bad Dog Metalworks Home Decor - Inspirational Gifts - Motivational Quotes - Metal Wall Decor - Happiness Art
results.description:
Bad Dog Metalworks Handmade, Custom Metal Art, and Home Decor. 

“Live, Laugh, Love" metal sign is made from 16 gauge metal. Available in bare metal or a variety of powder coat finishes.

Specs: 

10” (w) x 10” (h)

This item ships FREE to the continental United States. Please contact us for a quote on international orders.

Please note that our bare metal signs will rust organically. To avoid your item rusting, consider finishing it yourself or opting for one of our powder-coated options.

results.title: Live Laugh Poop,Bathroom Decor,Printable Wall Art,Digital Download,Laugh,Live,Funny,Quote,Live Laugh Love,Kids Bathroom Decor,Wall Art
results.description:
Get 5 prints for the price of 3! Simply checkout 5 items in your cart to automatically enjoy this 40% discount! Happy Shopping!

===

Your order will include 5 high quality JPEG files in various sizes. The sizes are as described below! 
Download your files and print them at home or at your local print shop. Frame and hang! :)

Here are details of each file:
1) Extra Small JPEG: (A6 Size) 4.1 in x 5.8 in / 10.5 cm x 14.8 cm. Print on an A4 to trim out your A6 size.

2) Small JPEG: (A5 Size) 5.8 in x 8.3 in / 14.8 cm x 21.0 cm. Print on an A4 to trim out your A5 size.

3) Medium JPEG: (A4 Size) 8.3 in x 11.7 in / 21.0 cm x 29.7 cm. Print on an A4 - no trimming is needed.

4) Large JPEG: (A3 Size) 11.7 in x 16.5 in / 29.7 cm x 42.0 cm. Print on an A3 - no trimming is needed.

5) Extra Large JPEG: (A2 Size) 16.5 in x 23.4 in / 42.0 cm x 59.4 cm. This will work with most standard picture sizes up to 18 in x 24 in

Each JPEG has a high-resolution (300 dots per inch), which will get you very clean and clear prints.

===

PLEASE NOTE: You will not receive a physical print in the mail when purchasing this listing. BUT when you receive the file to save on your computer, you can print it out as many times as you'd like to! Make sure to purchase a frame that fits the size of your print!

Please contact me if you have any questions, I'd be more than glad to help you :)

results.title: If a story is in you it has got to come out Pillow Cover | Vintage Typewriter | Inspirational Decor | Motivational Quotes | Bedroom Decor
results.description:
100% Hand Made.  Made in America.

This polyester cotton blend pillow's vintage typewriter design with American author, William Faulkner's words, "If a story is in you, it has got to come out" will no doubt challenge you creatively. Gift it to a someone with a dreamer's heart, a poetic soul, or an artistic talent to inspire them to release the story brewing inside, one way or another.

For reference pictures where taken using an 18x18 pillow insert.  You may purchase the pillow cover and reuse inserts you have or purchase the cover and insert together.  We sell high-quality hypoallergenic polyester fibre inserts locally made in Phoenix, AZ.  

DETAILS:
1 Accent Pillow Cover
Size: 10x10,12x12,14x14,16x16,18x18,20x20
Cover Front:   If a story is in you, it has got to come out - William Faulkner
Cover Back:   Plain White
Closure: Concealed Zipper
Fabric:    Mid-weight Cotton / Polyester Blend fabric woven material
Printing: Will not crack or peel as the ink has permanently adhered into the fabric. 
Other: Re-enforced Zipper Opening Ends.
           Neat, Over-Locked Inside Edges to prevent fraying and ensure longevity
           Quality checked, Inside and Out.
           This is a handcrafted design 

CARE SUGGESTIONS:
- Machine Wash - do not bleach. Lay flat or hang to dry.
- Touch up with warm iron, preferably over a slightly damp press cloth, if needed.

results.title: Moss Agate Fluorite Photo Frame Shabby Chic,French country vintage photo frame,Tatttered,Rag Bow,Gemstone Ornament,Hanging Picture frame
results.description:
Shabby Chic wooden heart shape photo frame embellished with Moss Agate and Fluorite Chips pendant and ragged bow.

Combination of cream, white, green, brown colors. 

The bow is made of many different types of lace and fabric, dyed in coffee. 
Additionally decorated with three strands pendant made of moss agate, fluorite chips, various metal beads and "live, laugh, love" metal pendant.

Measurement:
Frame: 10x10 cm (3.9x3.9 in); space for the picture: 6,5x6 cm (2.5x2.3 in)
Pendant: strand with pendant  is 8,5 cm (3.3 in) long, the other two are 7 cm (2.7 in).
The whole decoration from the hanger top to the bottom is 44 cm (17.3 in), about 12 cm (4.7 in) wide.

I inserted vintage girl image in the frame, but of course, you can insert any other picture/photo of your choice. 

Packed in glossy white cardoard gift box.

International registered airmail shipping.

results.title: Success Poem by Bessie Anderson Stanley Art Print Poster, Ready-To-Frame Picture, who has lived well, laughed often, and loved much;
results.description:
** Frame is for display only, and is not included with your purchase.

Often attributed to Robert Louis Stevenson or Ralph Waldo Emerson, this poem was actually written by Bessie Anderson Stanley in 1904. It was published in the Brown Book Magazine, and also included in Bartlett's Book of Quotations in the 1930's and 1940's. 

Artwork is digitally printed onto heavy-weight high quality paper. The rustic background of this piece, as well as the lettering, is printed onto the paper giving the finished piece a smooth surface. Art prints are shipped in a heavy cardboard mailer, or rolled in a tube, depending on the size ordered. Choose size from drop-down menu above. Print is available in 8x10, 11x14, 16x20 or 18x24.

Print is also available as a Canvas Gallery Wrap, Box Print or Metal Print.

results.title: Wrap Bracelet crinkle silk wrap boho hand stamped inspiration bracelet text, LIVE LAUGH LOVE #193
results.description:
Wrap the ribbon around your wrist, knot the ends or tuck them in. It's that easy!

This wrap bracelet with beautiful colors and made of 100% silk crinkle dyed and sewn by hand.

The ribbon is about 100 cm long, 1.3 cm wide and the walk ends in a point.

Depending on the wrist size you the bracelet 4 to 6 times to wrap your wrist.

This bracelet features an engraved tag made of aluminum.

The ribbon can be worn as a headband, anklet or necklace !!

The ribbon should be washed by hand in mild detergent solution, then smooth with your fingers and let it air dry.
The ribbon should be carefully ironed, please note that the position of the iron is on "silk" position.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Teacup - Fine Bone China Teacup and Saucer with Embellished with Platinum Silver
results.description:
Give this stunning pair of teacups and saucers as a very special fine bone china wedding gift. The Mrs/Always Right cup and saucer is decorated with oodles of swirling confetti in soft pinks, corals and real rose gold. A wedding keepsake and gorgeous gift with a contemporary humorous twist designed and manufactured in our home county Staffordshire. Staffordshire, affectionately known as The Potteries is the world capital of quality ceramics and its also where we had our beautiful packaging made too! 

This tea cup measures 8.5cm in diameter (as its widest dimension) and is 7.5cm tall. The saucer is 14.2 in diameter. Weight is approx 300g. The tea cup and saucer are supplied in a presentation box.

results.title: Rainbow Rose Crocheted Pin ["Life is art. Live it in color."] [mom | daughter | son | dad | child | artist | painter | Valentine | gift]
results.description:
Rainbow roses are just as unique as you!

This hand crocheted rainbow rose pin is perfect for celebrating love, friendship, and diversity.

The backing card reads: "Life is art. Live it in color."

Pins are made from worsted weight yarn and are securely attached to a bar pin.
Pins measure approximately 2" in diameter and are placed on a kraft paper backing card measuring approximately 2.25" x 3".

results.title: be our guest sign - Three Separate Pieces - Metal Wall Art Handmade Home Decor - Choose Small, Medium or Large - Choose your Patina Color
results.description:
be our guest sign - Three Separate Pieces - Metal Wall Art Handmade Home Decor - Choose Small, Medium or Large - Choose your Patina Color

When ordering:
-Choose Small, Medium or Large.
-Enter your Color Choice in the Personalization field.
-The color Palette is shown in the second photo.
-If you would like three different colors, enter all three colors in the Personalization field in the order of: live 1st, laugh 2nd and love 3rd.

Measurements:
-"Small" pieces hung together on the wall (as shown in the main listing photo) will measure 17.4” wide x 17.1” tall.
-Separate pieces of small sign measure: “be” 6.3” wide x 5.5” tall, “our” 10.4” wide x 4” tall, guest 16” wide x 7” tall.

-"Medium" pieces hung together on the wall will measure 24.7” wide x 26.1” tall.
Separate pieces of medium sign measure; “be” 9.8” wide x 8.4” tall, “our” 16.1” wide x 6.1” tall, guest 24.7” wide x 10.9” tall.

-"Large" pieces hung together on the wall will measure 35.8” wide x 34” tall.
Separate pieces of large sign measure: “be” 13.2” wide x 11.5” tall, “our” 21.8” wide x 8.3” tall, guest 33.5” wide x 14.7” tall.

Hanging:
-Stand offs keep it 3/4" from your wall to create a unique look with cool shadows and serve as hanging brackets.
-Simply hang using two small nails at the top two 3/4" stand offs welded to the back.

I cut this Metal Wall Art from very durable 1/8" thick steel.

Has a nice patina followed by a satin clear coat sealer.

Each sign is MADE TO ORDER making it a unique item.  No two are exactly the same.

Looks nice on your wall, shelf or on a mantle.

Many other signs, symbols, words and phrases available in my shop.

To see my other shop items: 

http://www.functionalsculpture.etsy.com

Thanks for viewing my work!
Chris

results.title: Sister Gift, 60th birthday, 50th birthday, 40th birthday, Best FRIEND Gift,  Milestone birthday, Bangle, Initial jewelry, birthday gift
results.description:
Perfect gift for any special friend or sister in your life who is turning the BIG 40 or 50!

This bracelet features a stainless steel adjustable bangle bracelet, that measures 60mm in size (expandable to fit wrist 7-8"). 

Dangling from the bangle bracelet will be
*a rhinestone initial charm to represent the initial of the recipient ( about 1")
*Your choice of charm - Always my sister forever my friend heart, Live Laugh Love, Friends are family we choose, Friends are the Sunshine of Life, or Remember the Moments.
*Double stacked bead - color of choice from last sample photo - topaz and blue zircon also available
* a double sided LOVE charm OR small filigree heart OR arrow charm
* a 40 and fabulous charm OR a 50 and fabulous charm OR a 60 and fabulous charm

Add an additional stainless steel charm with this listing.  https://www.etsy.com/listing/267091585/add-a-charm-to-any-buttonit-order-sister?ref=shop_home_active_10

It will come in a gift box tied with tulle and a decorative ribbon, ready for gift giving.
